task.title: Selecting the Parent of an Item in ContentMap

context.p: You can select the parent of an item with all its content.
To select the parent of an item in the ContentMap, do the following:

step.cmd: Select the parent of the item.

info.p: Select the parent of the item one of these ways:

choice.p: Press Ctrl-Alt-UpArrow twice (or more to select the parent of the parent and so on).
Choose Edit Select Parent twice (or more to select the parent of the parent and so on).

fig.title: The parent of the element selected in the ContentMap.
